title: Beard Care with Ayurveda: Oils and Grooming Tips
author: Harish
excerpt: A simple beard-care ritual with bhringraj and almond oil improves texture, reduces itch, and supports healthy facial hair growth.
content:
Beard Care Basics

Beard routines prioritize skin health under the hair. Dryness, itch, and flaking often come from neglected skin rather than hair alone. Oils nourish both hair and skin.

Why Bhringraj & Almond?

  • Bhringraj: Traditionally used to support hair strength and reduce breakage.
  • Almond Oil: Absorbs well, provides fatty acids, and is gentle on skin.

How to Use Beard Oil

  1. Apply 2–3 drops to palms and rub together.
  2. Massage into underlying skin, then comb through beard for even coverage.
  3. Use daily or as needed for conditioning and styling.
